title: Replace AI Performance section image with animated workflow visualization and add premium neon cursor

requirements.text: Replace the static image in the AI-Driven Performance Intelligence section (AIPerformanceSection.tsx) with a new animated AI automation workflow visualization. The visualization must show connected workflow nodes with an AI processing hub at the center, displaying a flow: CRM → AI Agent → Chatbot → Email → Analytics → Apps. Include floating dashboard panels with glassmorphism styling, neural network connection lines, and real-time performance indicators. Preserve all existing text, progress bar, and layout unchanged.

quotes: Replace ONLY the image inside the "AI-Driven Performance Intelligence" section
Keep the existing progress bar exactly as it is
CRM → AI Agent → Chatbot → Email → Analytics → Apps flow

requirements.text: Add enterprise-grade animations to the AI workflow visualization: animated data lines flowing between systems, soft pulsing connection paths, floating UI panels with slow motion, moving particles representing live data, subtle glow breathing effect, and continuous seamless loop. Animation must feel intelligent and purposeful, not decorative. Keep animation lightweight and optimized for fast loading and smooth scrolling.
